name: Drawdio
description:
Hello!

We are Team Drawdio, a group formed in Dr. Nakra's IMM 470 Class: Designing Music for Wellness.

Our team is currently designing an application to promote wellness.

The final version of the project, Drawdio, will be uploaded at the end of the Fall 2022 semester, most likely during the week of Dec 16.

Until then, please enjoy the beta version!
